ItemTooltips.clarity: NEED MANA EARLY USE FOR MANA.
ItemTooltips.flask: IT MAKES COOL SOUND WHEN USED.
ItemTooltips.power_treads: NO NEED FOR ARCANES WHEN YOU HAVE 8 MIN EULS.
ItemTooltips.orchid:
SILENCE KEY ENEMIES.
GOOD SYNERGY WITH ULTIMATE.
ItemTooltips.cyclone:
BEST ITEM IN GAME.
USE TO KILL ENEMIES.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter:
RANGE IS VERY GOOD.
USE EARLY TO MAXIMIZE DAMAGE EFFICIENCY.
REMEMBER LINA NEVER KILLSTEALS ALL KILLS BELONG TO LINA.
ItemTooltips.monkey_king_bar:
ATTK SPEED DMG GOOD.
SOME ENEMIES TRY TO HIDE BEHIND EVASION WITH NOOB ITEMS GET THIS TO FIND THEM.
ItemTooltips.desolator:
ESSENTIAL FOR TERRORIZING THE ENEMY.
DECREASE ARMOUR AND SHOOTER REDDER FIRE.
